Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth; medium quality, one end discoloured by resin(?). The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.29 ends per 10mm and weft c.11 picks per 10mm. The sides are torn, one end is cut and the other is broken. Presumably from a mummy.
Curator's comments: Light colour, indistinctness of splicing, close weave and the presence of resin all point to a late-ish date. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1992]
